body_text:
An old reverse harem anime about a girl who moves to her aunt's house, which was rented out to 3 or 4 guys It is an old reverse harem anime about a girl who moves to her aunt's house because it's closer to her high school. When she gets there, she realizes that her aunt rented out the house to three or four guys. One of them plays baseball and is in her grade.
The title used to be on myanimelist.com's reverse harem list until they changed the format of the website. Also it is not Nadeshiko Shichi Henge (a.k.a. The Wallflower). It's older. If you can help, it'll be great.

What is this manga about a girl who lives in her grandmother's house with three other guys and falls in love with one of them? I can't remember the title of this manga, but it starts with a girl who goes to live in her grandmother's house because her grandmother is sick, and finds out that she is living with three guys in that house. She falls in love with the guy whose bedroom is connected to hers. 

She also thought that one of the guy is a girl due to his appearance. A thief also break in into their house..
Already tried Fruit Basket but it is not what i'm looking for..
